desc: When starting the battle with more than 50% Health, Beast employs a Freestyle combat form; Critical hits have a 60% chance to inflict 811.3 Bleed damage over 4 seconds.

When starting the battle with less thatn 50% health, Beast employs an Acrobatic combat form.  This grants him a 85% chance when receiving Physical Critical Hits to reduce their Critical Damage by 85%. Additionally, the opponent gets 55% less POwer when getting hit by Beast.
Beasts thick hide makes him resistance to Bleed effects, decreasing their Potency and Duration by 65%.
Beast analyses the situation and employs a Freestyle combat form.
Increases Attack by 34.77 per hit in the combo meter, up to a maximum of 150% total Attack increase.
